wikipedia_page.main: Edward Caldecot Marsh (7 May 1865 – 27 November 1926) was an English cricketer who played first-class cricket for Somerset in 1885. He was born at Belgaum, Karnataka, India and died at Kendal, Westmorland (now Cumbria).

link_mentions.page: List of Somerset County Cricket Club players

response: * Edward Marsh (polymath) (1872–1953), British polymath, translator, arts patron and civil servant
